name: Waffle Defence
description:
[In browser audio doesn't work but downloadable version works]

King Waffle wants your head. Defend you ship at all costs. That last bottle of syrup was yours defend it with you life. 

Charge your ship to 100% and upgrade your weapons to escape from the planet of the waffles. 

Left click - create explosion at mouse point.

Escape - pause and access upgrades.

Made by Josh Grocock and Ryan Dale
